product_name: Columbia Insect Blocker Booney Hat with Cape
long_description: Featuring a sun cape and built-in insect-fighting technology, the Columbia Insect Blocker Booney hat provides cool coverage for hiking and traveling in hot weather. Nylon fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly; polyester mesh side panels enhance ventilation; 5.5 in. sun cape covers your neck. Insect Blocker#8482; fabric treatment uses permethrin to keep away biting and potentially disease-carrying insects. Permethrin is a man-made version of the natural insect repellent found in the chrysanthemum plant. Fabric features UPF 30 sun protection. Internal polyester headband keeps sweat out of your eyes; dark underbrim reduces glare. 3 in. brim and 5 in. sun cape shield your face and neck. Adjustable chin strap and drawcord at crown keep the Columbia Insect Blocker Booney hat with cape secure in windy conditions.
short_description: Featuring a sun cape and built-in insect-fighting technology, the Columbia Insect Blocker Booney hat provides cool coverage for hiking and traveling in hot weather.
